snippet.title: Let's! Revolution! Game Overview
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2111090/Lets_Revolution/
And visit https://letsrevolution.com/ for more details!

Let’s! Revolution! is a Minesweeper-inspired roguelite puzzle mashup about stopping a comically narcissistic King from exploiting the land of Beebom. Flip tiles to uncover the hidden path to the King as you face off against deadly minions while seeking out the skills and items needed to dethrone the King. Let's! Revolution! is the debut game from the award-winning animation house BUCK (https://buck.co/), with an original score and sound design by the acclaimed musicians at Antfood (https://www.antfood.com/).
